metadata.Title: CVE-2010-3844 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An unchecked sscanf() call in ettercap before 0.7.5 allows an insecuretemporary settings file to overflow a static-sized buffer on the stack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-3844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.0-11ubuntu0.3
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.0-11ubuntu0.3
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.0-11ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.0-11ubuntu0.3').
